mapper.sql: id, parent_id, tree_code, menu_name, menu_href, menu_target, menu_icon, permission, is_show, delFlag, add_user, add_time, update_user, update_name, remarks
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO admin_menu
id,
parent_id,
tree_code,
menu_name,
menu_href,
menu_target,
menu_icon,
permission,
is_show,
del_flag,
add_user,
add_time,
update_user,
update_name,
remarks,
#{id},
#{parentId},
#{treeCode},
#{menuName},
#{menuHref},
#{menuTarget},
#{menuIcon},
#{permission},
#{isShow},
#{delFlag},
#{addUser},
now(),
#{updateUser},
#{updateName},

mapper.update:
UPDATE admin_menu
parent_id = #{parentId},
tree_code = #{treeCode},
menu_name = #{menuName},
menu_href = #{menuHref},
menu_target = #{menuTarget},
menu_icon = #{menuIcon},
permission = #{permission},
is_show = #{isShow},
del_flag = #{delFlag},
add_user = #{addUser},
add_time = #{addTime},
update_user = #{updateUser},
update_name = #{updateName},
remarks = #{remarks},
WHERE id = #{id}
